product_name: Mountain Hardwear Pyxis Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and lusciously soft, the women's Mountain Hardwear Pyxis Jacket clothes you in comfort for all kinds of mild-weather adventures in the great outdoors. Soft, non-pilling polyester fleece retains warmth and continues to insulate even if wet. Fleece-lined chin guard; dual hem drawcords; zippered handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and lusciously soft, the women's Mountain Hardwear Pyxis Jacket clothes you in comfort for all kinds of mild-weather adventures in the great outdoors.
